translation.en: [woman] I have the honor today to introduce you to Retired Captain William Miller.
translation.fr: J'ai l'honneur de vous présenterle capitaine à la retraite William Miller.

translation.en: He's been everywhere in the world you all wanna go...
translation.fr: Il a visité tous les endroitsparadisiaques au monde,

translation.en: and a bunch of places you don't.
I've asked him to come and talk to you all today
translation.fr: Je l'ai invité à venir vous parleraujourd'hui

translation.en: at this important crossroad in your careers.
translation.fr: de ce tournant décisif de vos carrières.

translation.en: I'm gonna step out so this conversation can be frank and to the point.
translation.fr: Je vais sortir d'ici pour vous laisserdiscuter de manière honnête et directe.

translation.en: About five years ago, when I was on leave...
translation.fr: Il y a à peu près cinq ans,alors que j'étais en permission,

translation.en: ...I found myself standing in the middle of the cereal aisle at the Publix...
translation.fr: je me suis retrouvé au beau milieudu rayon céréales de mon supermarché,

translation.en: with my arm around some guy's throat.
translation.fr: avec le bras... autour du cou d'un type.

translation.en: I was squeezing so hard he pissed himself.
translation.fr: Je le serrais si fortqu'il s'était pissé dessus.

translation.en: My fiancée at the time had to climb on my back
translation.fr: Ma fiancée à l'époquea dû me sauter sur le dos

translation.en: just so I didn't actually kill the guy.
translation.fr: pour m'empêcher de tuer le gars.

translation.en: Do you know why I was doing this?
translation.fr: Vous savez pourquoi j'ai fait ça ?

translation.en: Because he hadn't moved his cart when I asked.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas obéi à mon ordrede pousser son chariot.

translation.en: I was the best of the best,
able to shut down, control, manipulate...
all basic human instincts towards one goal:
translation.fr: tous mes instincts primairesdans un seul but...

translation.en: the completion of my mission.
But the effects of committing extreme violence on other human beings
translation.fr: Mais les actes d'extrême violenceenvers d'autres humains ont des effets

translation.en: are biological
and physiological.
That's the price of being a warrior.
translation.fr: C'est le prix à payer pour un guerrier.

translation.en: [pilot on radio, in Spanish] Is everything clear in the valley?
translation.fr: La voie est libre dans la vallée ?

translation.en: Affirmative!
[pilot] Copy that.
Enter, enter, enter!
[pilot] Let's go!
♪ Make his fight on the hill In the early day ♪
[officer 2 over radio] Enter, enter, enter.
[officer 3 over megaphone] Let me inform you
that we have you surrounded.
So, put down your weapons,
come out of the building
with your hands behind your head.
translation.fr: avec les mains sur la tête.

translation.en: How many did you say were in there?
translation.fr: T'as dit qu'il y en avait combienà l'intérieur ?

translation.en: No more than ten.
You guys hold this position.
We're going to find other cover.
translation.fr: Nous, on va se mettre à couvert ailleurs.

translation.en: But hold here.
Good.
Rodriguez!
Rodriguez, can you hold your position?
translation.fr: Rodriguez, tu peux maintenir ta position ?

translation.en: [captain over radio] Rodriguez!
Fuck no!
We need to get back.
I said, maintain your positions.
-Hold on! -[officer 4] Move him! Move him!
Rodriguez?
Rodriguez?
[captain over radio] Rodriguez!
[officer 4] Diego!
Hold on!
Advance.
[officer 4] Nice shot.
[Diego] I'm so tired of arresting all of you
translation.fr: J'en ai ras-le-bol d'avoir à vous arrêter

translation.en: only to simply find you all here again.
translation.fr: pour ensuite vous retrouver tous ici.

translation.en: Oh, my adviser is here.
Ready, brother?
America is listening.
Take the money, brother.
You lose nothing.
I already have the money. [sighs]
And... and Lorea?
[Diego] What was it that you said?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu viens de dire ?

translation.en: Now you're turning on your own boss?
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu te retournescontre ton propre boss ?

translation.en: [stammers] I know where he is.
Fucking snitch. Shh!
[Diego] Where's that?
In Mexico? Disneyland?
Where?
No, no.
He's hiding in the jungle, my brother.
translation.fr: Il est planqué dans la jungle, mon frère.

translation.en: He went there because he doesn't trust banks or any of those things anymore. [panting]
translation.fr: Parce qu'il ne fait plus confianceaux banques et compagnie.

translation.en: Sir, you could find him.
translation.fr: Monsieur, vous pouvez le trouver, vous.

translation.en: You just got yourself killed, fucker.
translation.fr: Tu viens de signer ton arrêt de mort.

translation.en: Silence!
Lift up, lift up your little face.
Is this guy telling me the truth?
translation.fr: Ce que ce gars raconte est vrai ?

translation.en: Does anyone else out here want to try to assault a police officer?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un d'autre ici veut agresserun officier de police ?

translation.en: Or tell fairy tales about Mr. Lorea?
translation.fr: Ou encore raconter des histoiresà dormir debout sur M. Lorea ?

translation.en: Take them to the trucks.
-[officers shouting] -I'll go after her.
Get up there with the bikes, now!
Move! Move!
[Diego over radio] Santiago? Santiago?
[Diego] Santiago, where are you?
Yes, Diego?
I don't know where I am.
translation.fr: Je sais pas où je suis.

translation.en: But she escaped. I lost her.
translation.fr: Mais elle s'est tirée. Je l'ai perdue.

translation.en: -[speaking Spanish] -[driver speaking Spanish]
-[in English] What were you doing there? -[woman] Warning my brother.
translation.fr: Tu foutais quoi là-bas ? Je prévenais mon frère.

translation.en: Jesus.
[woman] You said it was going down at noon,
-and it's ten fucking thirty. -It wasn't my bust.
translation.fr: T'avais dit midi.Il est 10h30, putain. Oui, mais c'était pas ma descente.

translation.en: It was never my bust. [in Spanish] He changed it.
translation.fr: Oui, mais c'était pas ma descente. Il a changé l'heure.

translation.en: -They took him? -I don't know.
translation.fr: - Ils l'ont eu ?- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: They took my brother, and you have to get him out.
translation.fr: Ils ont eu mon frère.Tu dois le tirer de là.

translation.en: -Get him out? -Yes.
You're lucky he's still alive.
translation.fr: Estime-toi heureuse qu'il soit en vie.

translation.en: But he won't be alive for very long.
translation.fr: Mais il ne le restera pas pour longtemps.

translation.en: [Santiago] You never should've let your idiot brother get involved with this shit.
translation.fr: Tu n'aurais jamais dû laisser ton idiotde frère se mêler à ce bordel.

translation.en: [in English] What if I told you I know?
I know where Lorea is.
translation.fr: Je connais la planque de Lorea.

translation.en: I know where the money is.
translation.fr: Je sais où se trouve le fric.

translation.en: How long have you known?
Three months.
And why wouldn't you tell me that?
Because I'm just your informant, right?
translation.fr: Parce que je ne suis que ton indic, non ?

translation.en: That's all I am?
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que je suis.

translation.en: If you've got something to tell me, right now is the time to do it.
translation.fr: Si t'as un truc à me dire,c'est le moment ou jamais.

translation.en: [informant] I...
was given a promotion.
I deliver vans full of money...
translation.fr: Je livre des blindés bourrés de fric

translation.en: to Lorea's house in the jungle.
translation.fr: à la maison de Lorea dans la jungle.

translation.en: That's where he keeps the money.
translation.fr: C'est là qu'il cache le fric.

translation.en: [in Spanish] His house is a safe.
[in English] And just so you know,
Lorea pays Diego and all of those men that hired you way too much money.
translation.fr: Lorea paie des sommes colossalesà Diego et tous tes employeurs.

translation.en: They've just been watching you chase your tail.
translation.fr: Ils s'amusent à te regardertourner en rond.

translation.en: But now, maybe, you can actually do something.
translation.fr: Mais maintenant, tu pourrais peut-êtrefaire quelque chose de concret.

translation.en: Your government has put a lot of time, money, and training into all of you,
translation.fr: Votre pays a investi beaucoup de temps, de fonds et de formations pour vous.

translation.en: and it does not want to lose that investment.
translation.fr: Et il veut pas perdre cet investissement.

translation.en: Over the next few weeks,
you will be bombarded with offers to take your skill set and use them
translation.fr: on va vous bombarder d'offres promettantde mettre à profit vos compétences

translation.en: in the private sector.
I was suckered into the same thing.
translation.fr: Je me suis fait empapaouterpar le même truc.

translation.en: That's what I'm here to say,
that I have never had a feeling as pure or proud
translation.fr: que je n'ai jamais ressentiautant de fierté ou de satisfaction

translation.en: as completing a mission with our flag on my shoulder.
translation.fr: qu'en accomplissant une missionavec notre drapeau sur l'épaule.

translation.en: Stay where you belong.
Thank you.
-[door opens] -[William] Good luck.
How many times have you given that speech?
translation.fr: Tu l'as donné combien de fois, ce laïus ?

translation.en: It'll be 173.
[Santiago laughs] Still keeping count of everything in your life?
Of course.
-[Santiago] It's still a good speech. -Thank you.
translation.fr: - Ça reste un super discours.- Merci.

translation.en: How you been?
I'm okay. You?
Did you get my text?
Yeah.
[Santiago] So? What's your take?
Who else do you have?
I came to you first.
If you can get Redfly,
I'll do it.
Really?
Yeah.
[Santiago] Do you think he's up for it?
I just feel like we owe him. Besides...
translation.fr: Je crois qu'on lui doit bien ça. De plus...

translation.en: it's always a little harder than you think it's gonna be, right?
translation.fr: c'est toujours un peu plus compliquéque prévu, non ?

translation.en: Get the captain, I'm in.
translation.fr: Recrute le Capitaine et je serai partant.

translation.en: So... this is three bedroom... and one and a half baths.
translation.fr: C'est donc trois chambres à coucher avec une salle de bain et un WC.

translation.en: Nice view out the back window here.
translation.fr: Cette fenêtre donne sur une belle vue.

translation.en: Gets good light.
Kitchen's right this way.
They're asking $120,000.
-I think there's some flexibility there. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Je crois qu'il y a moyen de négocier.- D'accord.

translation.en: I don't think this is the one for us. Thank you, though.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas vraiment ce qu'on cherche.Mais, merci.

translation.en: All right, thank you.
[Santiago] Hey, I'm lookin' for a condo.
I hear you're the guy to talk to.
translation.fr: Vous êtes l'homme qu'il me faut.

translation.en: -Sorry to track you down like this. -Hey, man.
translation.fr: - Désolé de te traquer comme ça.- Salut, mec.

translation.en: I called your office.
-[Redfly] It's good to see you. -[Santiago] Good to see you.
translation.fr: - Content de te voir.- Oui, moi aussi.

translation.en: -You look great. -Ah, yeah, right.
translation.fr: - T'as bonne mine.- C'est ça, oui.

translation.en: -No, you do. -It's been a while, huh?
translation.fr: - C'est vrai.- Ça fait un bail, hein ?

translation.en: Well, we didn't hear from you for a couple of years.
translation.fr: On est sans nouvelles de toidepuis des années,

translation.en: We thought you might have gone full native in the jungle.
translation.fr: on s'est ditque tu étais devenu autochtone.

translation.en: [Santiago] Yeah, I know.
Sorry.
-So, how are you? -[Redfly sighs]
Uh... I'm okay.
[Santiago] Yeah, I heard about you and Molly.
translation.fr: - J'ai appris pour toi et Molly.- Ouais.

translation.en: Yeah. It happens.
translation.fr: - J'ai appris pour toi et Molly.- Ouais. C'est la vie.

translation.en: So, I got a job for you.
translation.fr: En fait, j'ai une mission pour toi.

translation.en: Guaranteed 17 grand for a week of consulting.
translation.fr: Je t'offre 17 000 $pour une semaine de consulting.

translation.en: No action unless you want it. It's just a recce.
translation.fr: Aucune action requise.Juste une mission de reconnaissance.

translation.en: I'm retired.
I know. [chuckles]
What is it?
We're gonna get Gabriel Martin Lorea.
translation.fr: On va choper Gabriel Martin Lorea.

translation.en: [Redfly] Haven't you been trying to do that for years?
translation.fr: - Tu le traques pas depuis belle lurette ?- Si.

translation.en: Yes. I could never find him, and I finally did.
translation.fr: - Tu le traques pas depuis belle lurette ?- Si. Je ne l'ai jamais trouvéjusqu'à maintenant.

translation.en: I can't do it, man.
There's more of this shit around now than ever.
translation.fr: Y a jamais eu autant de boulot.

translation.en: Anthony was down here trying to get me to go to Africa for a month,
translation.fr: Anthony m'a demandéd'aller en Afrique pour un mois,

translation.en: -but I-- I can't-- I can't do it. -[Santiago] I need you on this one.
translation.fr: Anthony m'a demandéd'aller en Afrique pour un mois, mais je peux pas. J'ai besoin de toi.

translation.en: -It's less than a week of work. -I would love to.
translation.fr: - C'est moins d'une semaine.- Tu sais que j'adorerais.

translation.en: God knows I could use the money, but I'm supporting two households right now.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin de fric,mais je nourris deux familles, là.

translation.en: There's potential for significant upside on this.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais te faire une jolie somme.

translation.en: Will you just take a look at my work on it?
translation.fr: Jette juste un coup d'œilsur mes recherches.

translation.en: -Are you going to Benny's fight? -[Santiago] Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu vas au combat de Benny ?- Oui.

translation.en: I gotta pick up Tess. I'm late. Molly's gonna kill me.
translation.fr: Tess doit m'attendre. Molly va me tuer.

translation.en: -Just ride with me, okay? -[Santiago] All right.
[Santiago] Molly's still letting you over here, even after the split?
translation.fr: Molly te laisse venir icimalgré votre séparation ?

translation.en: Only in the garage.
[Santiago] I'm sorry.
[sighs] Tess!
-Still drink? -[Santiago] Oh, yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu bois toujours ?- Oh, que oui.

translation.en: Want a beer?
[Tom] Ah, shit.
[sighs] You sleeping with this woman?
The accountant, the bean counter who gave you all the information.
translation.fr: La comptable qui t'a filétous les renseignements.

translation.en: I'm guessing she's hot.
-[can opens] -What's that supposed to mean?
Oh, well, I just noticed, over the years,
translation.fr: Au fil des années,j'ai remarqué que tes indics

translation.en: your informants tend to be very attractive women.
translation.fr: Au fil des années,j'ai remarqué que tes indics sont souvent des nanas canons.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
translation.fr: Non, je couche pas avec elle.

translation.en: [clicks tongue, sighs] Why not?
[Santiago] It's a fucked-up enough situation as it is.
translation.fr: La situation est assez foireuse comme ça.

translation.en: [Tom] Hey, babe.
[Santiago] Hey, Tess!
[sighs] Santiago.
Wow, so grown up, man.
-[Tom] Oh, I don't know about that. -[Santiago chuckles]
translation.fr: Je sais pas de quoi tu parles.

translation.en: I made 17 grand my first year in the service, man.
translation.fr: J'ai touché 17 000 $pendant ma première année dans l'armée.

translation.en: If you told me then I'd be passing that up for a week's work...
translation.fr: Si je savais que je pouvaistoucher autant en une semaine...

translation.en: Don't worry about her, she's 15. She's not listening to a word we say.
translation.fr: T'inquiète. Elle a 15 ans.Elle se fiche de ce qu'on raconte.

translation.en: [Santiago] Seventeen grand is just for the recce.
But if we decide to move forward, this could be a whole lot more than that.
translation.fr: Mais si on décide d'intervenir,on peut empocher beaucoup plus.

translation.en: I've cut a deal with the agency down there.
translation.fr: J'ai passé un accord avec l'agence.

translation.en: We keep 25% of anything we seize.
translation.fr: On garde 25 % de ce qu'on saisit.

translation.en: I've got estimates he's got over $75 million in cash with him.
translation.fr: Selon mes estimations,il a plus de 75 millions en liquide.

translation.en: -[Tom] Holy shit. -Yeah.
Let's say the money is there. How do we get paid?
translation.fr: Disons que le fric y est. Comment on va être payés ?

translation.en: 'Cause this shit is serious, and it takes real planning.
translation.fr: Ce truc est sérieux.Il faut planifier à fond.

translation.en: And you know that. [Santiago] I've got a lawyer in St. John's
translation.fr: - Tu le sais.- Mon avocate de Saint-Jean

translation.en: who set up an offshore shell security operation
translation.fr: a mis en place une opérationde sécurité fictive

translation.en: that's ready to pay out a salary and bonuses for the rest of our lives.
translation.fr: qui nous payera des salaires et primespour le restant de nos jours.

translation.en: It'll just come in like any other paycheck.
translation.fr: Ce sera comme un simple salaire.

translation.en: Will you take a look at my work on it?
translation.fr: Jette un coup d'œil sur mes recherches.

translation.en: No, I don't want to see that because then I can't unsee it.
translation.fr: Si je regarde ça, ce sera irréversible.

translation.en: This operation is... illegal, right?
translation.fr: C'est une opération illicite, c'est ça ?

translation.en: This is not illegal.
My company's under contract to an agency of a foreign government.
translation.fr: Ma société est liée par contratà une agence d'un gouvernement étranger.

translation.en: And besides, even if it was illegal, most of the live fire you've done's been
translation.fr: De plus, même si c'était illicite,la plupart des balles que tu as tirées

translation.en: against the Geneva Convention, technically, so...
translation.fr: contrevenaient à la Convention de Genève,donc...

translation.en: [Tom] Come on, you're a better salesman than that. This is a very different thing.
translation.fr: Allez, t'es meilleur vendeur que ça.C'est une autre paire de manches.

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[Tess] So you're trying to get him to go back to work?
translation.fr: Alors t'essayesde le remettre au travail ?

translation.en: Maybe. Why?
No reason.
You think your mom would still let him go?
translation.fr: Tu crois que ta mèrele laisserait repartir ?

translation.en: [Tess] My mom? [chuckles] Of course.
-She's not the problem. [sighs] -[door chimes jingle]
translation.fr: mais c'est pas elle le problème.

translation.en: [Tess] He hasn't worked since they forced him to retire.
translation.fr: Il a pas travaillé depuisqu'ils l'ont forcé à prendre sa retraite.

translation.en: Your dad's a good man.
translation.fr: Ton papa est un homme bien.

translation.en: You shouldn't be too hard on him.
translation.fr: Sois pas si dure avec lui.

translation.en: So, I guess you'll just keep selling condos,
translation.fr: Bon, je suppose que tu continuerasà vendre des apparts et moi à mitrailler

translation.en: and I'll run and gun until my knees finally blow out.
translation.fr: Bon, je suppose que tu continuerasà vendre des apparts et moi à mitrailler jusqu'à ce qu'on m'explose les genoux.

translation.en: Or you could do this without me.
translation.fr: Ou tu pourrais t'en sortir sans moi.

translation.en: I could. But I don't wanna,
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Mais c'est pas ce que je veux,parce qu'on mérite mieux, mon vieux.

translation.en: 'cause I say we deserve better, man.
translation.fr: Mais c'est pas ce que je veux,parce qu'on mérite mieux, mon vieux.

translation.en: How many times did we fly around with 20 million bucks at our feet
translation.fr: Combien de fois avons-nous eu20 millions de dollars à nos pieds

translation.en: to pay off some cockroach somewhere, and we never took a dime?
translation.fr: pour aller payer un minable quelconquesans jamais toucher un centime ?

translation.en: -Hell, you've been shot four times. -Five.
translation.fr: - Tu t'es fait tirer dessus quatre fois.- Cinq.

translation.en: You've been shot five times for your country,
translation.fr: Tu t'es pris cinq balles pour ton pays

translation.en: and you can't even afford a new truck.
translation.fr: et tu peux même pas t'acheterun nouveau pick-up.

translation.en: That's the real crime.
-Good to see you, Tess. -[Tess] Good to see you.
-You coming back? -Yeah, I'll be back in 20.
translation.fr: Tu vas revenir ? Je la déposeet je reviens dans 20 minutes.

translation.en: I gotta drop her off. Is Ironhead in?
translation.fr: Je la déposeet je reviens dans 20 minutes. Ironhead est partant ?

translation.en: Only if you are.
-Just take a look. -Fine.
I'll take a look. Leave my truck outta this.
translation.fr: Ne mêle plus mon pick-up à ça,

translation.en: This isn't about my truck.
Yes, it is. That's exactly what this is about!
translation.fr: Si, c'est exactement de ça qu'il s'agit.

translation.en: -Your mom will pick you up, okay? -Yep.
translation.fr: - Ta mère viendra te chercher.- D'accord.

translation.en: [Tom] Hey!
I love you.
I miss you.
-[William] What'd he say? -He's taking a look at it.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il a dit ? Il va y jeter un œil.

translation.en: He may not be up for this.
[William] You know he's the best with something this complex.
translation.fr: Tu sais qu'il est le meilleurpour ce niveau de complexité

translation.en: And he needs this right now.
translation.fr: et il a besoin de ça en ce moment.

translation.en: [Santiago] All right.
[scoffs] This shit is fuckin' depressing.
C'mon.
Let your brother have some fun. Support him.
translation.fr: Ton frère doit se défouler.Faut l'encourager.

translation.en: [William] I've been supporting him since the day he was born.
translation.fr: Je l'encourage depuis qu'il est né.

translation.en: -[door opens] -That kid's a one-in-a-million talent,
translation.fr: On n'en fait plus des comme lui

translation.en: going out there, playing the fucking clown to a bunch of hillbillies.
translation.fr: et il s'amuse à faire le zouavedevant un tas de ploucs.

translation.en: where are my corner men?
Holy shit, look who it is!
[Santiago] What's up, Benny? Oh, holy shit!
[groans] Oh, God!
Hell of a night for you to show.
-It's great to see you, man. -You as well.
translation.fr: - Content de te voir, mec.- Toi aussi.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Hey! Every day you're uglier.
[Santiago chuckles] Ah, you little shithead.
Good to see you.
[Santiago, in English] Did you boys get my text?
translation.fr: Vous avez tous eu mon texto ?

translation.en: -Yeah? -[man chuckles]
Fish?
I need a pilot. I can't do this thing without you.
translation.fr: Il me faut un pilote, tu dois venir.

translation.en: I don't know, man. I got the new baby now,
translation.fr: Je sais pas, mec. Je viens d'avoir un bébé

translation.en: and my lady isn't into me doing this kinda shit anymore.
translation.fr: et ma nana s'oppose catégoriquementà ce genre de trucs.

translation.en: What-- What does that mean?
Did you read the text? This can change you and that baby's life forever.
translation.fr: T'as lu le texto ? Ce truc peut changerà jamais ta vie et celle du bébé.

translation.en: What happened to that bullshit about going back to your mother's homeland
translation.fr: Et ton baratin de rentrerdans le pays de ta mère

translation.en: and empowering the people to police themselves?
translation.fr: et de donner au peuple le pouvoirde maintenir l'ordre ?

translation.en: Anyway, I lost my license. I can't even fly right now.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu ma licence, de toute façon.Je ne peux plus voler.

translation.en: Well, I don't need a pilot with a license.
translation.fr: J'ai pas besoin d'un pilote licencié.

translation.en: I'm in with the army down there. I just need a pilot I can trust.
translation.fr: L'armée me couvre là-bas.Un pilote de confiance suffira.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think so.
[Santiago sighs, chuckles] Okay. Lorea is destroying that country.
translation.fr: D'accord. Lorea est en train de démolir leur pays.

translation.en: So we get to take out a very bad man, and, oh, by the way,
translation.fr: On a la chance de choper un sale typeet, par la même occasion,

translation.en: there's a winning lottery ticket stuck to the bottom of your cowboy boot.
translation.fr: de se retrouver avec un ticket gagnantsous les santiags.

translation.en: Every guy in that gym would jump at this.
translation.fr: Personne dans cette sallene raterait cette occasion.

translation.en: Come on, focus, guys! It's fight night.
Yeah, don't worry about that bullshit.
translation.fr: T'en fais pas pour ces conneries.

translation.en: Sorry, Benny.
You ready for this?
-Hell yeah. -[bell dings]
